:: Wolfgang ::

:: Wolfgang flies up the mountain, and after a few minuets, reaches 
it's peak.  Wolfgang lands, trying not to make noise.  He didn't want 
the aliens to see or notice Wolfgang or his troops. ::

Here they are.  Do not fire until notified.  I wish to speak with 
them. 

:: Takes out "the artic chill", a large, basooka-type weapon from his 
back and hoists it on his shoulder. ::

Ready?
